abstract: A bidding war over Japan Air emphasizes the importance of Japan as a transfer point to Asian routes.
snippet: A bidding war over Japan Air emphasizes the importance of Japan as a transfer point to Asian routes.
lead_paragraph: With the ink barely dry on a landmark aviation treaty between the United States and Japan, a billion-dollar bidding war escalated Wednesday over which American carrier would team up with troubled Japan Airlines.

headline.main: Air Routes in Asia Stir Bidding War
headline.print_headline: Air Routes In Asia Stir Bidding War
